cause.description:
"I may detest what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it." "Speak your mind, even if your voice shakes." This is beyond the first amendment. This is a response to the fact that silence kills. Supporting this cause means that when something, anything, moves you, you will Speak Out.
1. The freedom of speech, thought, and expression are fundamental rights.
cause.mission: Advocate the freedom of speech throughout the world
cause.name: Speak Out
